channel.title: 수학 on 데이터 사이언스 블로그
channel.description: Recent content in 수학 on 데이터 사이언스 블로그

item.title: [행렬]Quadratic form
item.author: uqpuark@gmail.com (uqpuark)
item.description: Derivative of a Quadratic Form Let \( \vec{a} = (a_1,a_2,\cdots,a_n)^T, \vec{\mu} = ( \mu_1, \mu_2, \cdots , \mu_n)^T \) \( \begin{aligned} &{ \partial \vec{a}^T\vec{\mu} \over \partial \vec{\mu} } = { \partial \vec{\mu}^T\vec{a} \over \partial \vec{\mu} } = { \partial \over \partial \vec{\mu} }\sum_{i=1}^aa_iu_i \\\ &= [ { \partial \sum_{i=1}^aa_iu_i \over \partial \vec{\mu}_1 } \cdots { \partial \sum_{i=1}^aa_iu_i \over \partial \vec{\mu}_n } ] \\\ &= [ a_1, a_2, \cdots, a_n ] \\\ &= a^T \end{aligned} \)

item.title: [행렬]Hat Matrix
item.author: uqpuark@gmail.com (uqpuark)
item.description: Hat Matrix The Hat Matrix $$ H=X(X^TX)^{-1}X^T $$
